heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Restriction on
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Restriction on 

Assembly of Live Birds) Regulations 2020 (Revocation) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited avian influenza (restriction assembly live birds) regulation 2020 (revocation) regulation 2021

title: conferred on him by section 36 of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No.
heading: 2. The Avian Influenza (Restriction on Assembly of Live Birds)
text_raw:
2. The Avian Influenza (Restriction on Assembly of Live Birds) 

Regulations 2020 are revoked. 

GIVEN under of the Minister for Agriculture, 
Food and the Marine, 

3 June, 2021. 

JUNE FANNING, 
An officer authorised to authenticate the Seal of the Minister. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 8th June, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [272] 3
text_norm: 2 avian influenza (restriction assembly live birds) regulation 2020 revoked given minister agriculture food marine 3 june 2021 june fanning officer authorised authenticate seal minister notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 8th june 2021 272 3

title: conferred on him by section 36 of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No.
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

The effect of these Regulations is to revoke the Avian Influenza (Restriction on 
Assembly of Live Birds) Regulations 2020 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [272]
